Title: Three Colors: Red
Writer: Krzysztof Kieslowski, Krzysztof Piesiewicz, Agnieszka Holland (scenario collaborator), Edward Klosinski (scenario collaborator), Marcin Latallo (dialogue translation), Edward Zebrowski (scenario collaborator)
Actors: Irène Jacob, Jean-Louis Trintignant, Frédérique Feder, Jean-Pierre Lorit
Plot: A model discovers a retired judge is keen on invading people's privacy.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 17 wins & 21 nominations.
